  • Method Details

    • getCalendarEvents

      public static ArrayList<CalendarEvent> getCalendarEvents()
      Method that returns the list of calendar events
      Returns:
      calendarEvents

    • createGUI

      public static void createGUI()
      Creates the Graphical User Interface (GUI) for the application, sets up the event listeners and displays the initial view.

    • addEvent

      public static void addEvent(Bloco bloco)
      Adds a new event to the calendarEvents list, based on the given Bloco object. The event's date, start time, end time, and text are extracted from the Bloco object. The event's color is set to pink.
      Parameters:
      bloco - the Bloco object to use as the basis for the new event
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if bloco is null

    • showGUI

      public static void showGUI()
      This method makes the GUI visible

    • setVisible

      public static void setVisible()
      This method makes specific buttons visible after a calendar is uploaded

    • treatClass

      public static void treatClass(CalendarEvent aula)
      This method decides, based on the current calendar view, if it's to add classes or remove to the personal calendar

    • uploadChoose

      public static void uploadChoose()
      Method for choosing the upload method

    • uploadLocal

      public static void uploadLocal()
      Method for the "Upload Local" . Opens a file chooser to select a file from the system. The file is then parsed and the schedule data is loaded into the program. The buttons are then added to the frame and the frame is repainted if the schedule is sucessfuly loaded.

    • uploadRemoto

      public static void uploadRemoto()
      Method for the "Upload Remoto". Opens a text box for the user to input an url, followed by a save file box for the user to choose where to save the uploaded file in the system. The file is then parsed and the schedule data is loaded into the program. The buttons are then added to the frame and the frame is repainted if the schedule is sucessfuly loaded.
